It is notpossible to generate intermediate output, and it is not possible to select the number of candidates to be computed(the routine will return 2 candidates).Usage: [afixed,sqnorm,Qahat,Z] = lambda2 (afloat,Qahat); afloat Input Original float ambiguitiesQahat Input Corresponding variance-covariance matrixafixed Output Array with estimated integer candidates, sorted accordingto the corresponding squared norms, best candidate firstsqnorm Output Corresponding squared normsQzhat Output Decorrelated variance-covariance matrixZ Output Z-transformation matrix
